artist: Engraver: John Hamilton Mortimer; Painter: After Guercino (Giovanni Francesco Barbieri); Publisher: John Boydell
description: the Virgin with Christ child asleep on lap turned toward St. John standing on table at left reading from paper in his hand
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet below image around arms in black: [Guercino pinxt.   J. Mortimer fecit/ THE VIRGIN TEACHING ST. JOHN./ From the Original Picture painted by Guercino in the Collection of Mr. Renolds/ Vol.II No. 9  Size of the picture 2F. 81/2 by 3F. 7 in length  John Boydell excud\'t 1766];  on sheet in pencil: [1-508]
title: The Virgin Teaching St. John
